task.title: Reloading external references
task.shortdesc: When you open or print a drawing, any external references in the drawing are updated automatically. If a drawing is already open and a referenced drawing is modified, you can update the current drawing manually to display the latest version of the referenced drawing. You may also want to reload an external reference that has been unloaded temporarily.

step.cmd: Choose Insert > Xref Manager from the main menu.
Select the external reference to reload.
